alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 16 at 1:29PM MST until February 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 MPH with gusts up to 60 MPH possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Converse and eastern Platte Counties including Deer Creek, Glenrock, Douglas, Glendo, and Wheatland. * WHEN...8 AM MST Friday until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph, or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County
